CAREER OBJECTIVE

To be associated with a progressive organization to acquire a responsible career position towards the growth of corporate and professional where I can boost my potential in order to give the whole sole contribution to my team & the organization in the challenging & competitive environment through logical & timeline product deliverable skills.

· Software developer with 1+ years of industry experience in BI environment, successfully performing responsibilities of creating, deploying and managing many different automated ETL Processes to provide solution and support for business requirements of reporting and migration.
